text: (nam) napi tan manaivikalil oruvaritam oru visayattai irakaciyamakak kuriya camayattil, appen atai (marroru manaivikku) arivittu vittar. Atai allah avarukku veliyakkit tantan. Napi (atil) cilavarrai (am'manaivikku) arivittuc cilavarrai (arivikkatu) purakkanittu vittar. (Ivvaru) napi tan manaivikku arivikkave, am'manaivi ‘‘itai unkalukku arivittavar yar?'' Enak kettar. Atarku avar “(anaittaiyum) nankarintu terintavane atai enakku arivittan'' enru kurinar
